
# What's for dinner?


[![License: GPL v3](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-GPLv3-blue.svg)](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0)

## Description

A recipe finder app

## Table of Contents

## Install

npm i

## Usage

Use the web application to search for recipes, get a random recipe and save favorites
